column4: a passenger bus went off-road at 5 pm on November 11
column5: 2018. The accident took place along  National Road 33 at Odong Village
column8: “Phnom Penh 3B-2719” had a large number of Vietnamese passengers on board.------Phou Hok Seng
column10: said that the vehicle left the road to avoid a collision with another vehicle. Nobody was injured in the crash.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/734779.html
